targets.rawSql:
select a.id, 
a.nombre as "Area",
( select count(*) from $esq.sensores where id_area = a.id and inactivo = false ) as "S. Activos",
( select count(*) from $esq.sensores where id_area = a.id and inactivo = true ) as "S. Inactivos",
( select $esq.getNumeroSensoresAlertaArea(a.id::text, '0', '${__from:date}', '${__to:date}') ) as "Sin Alerta",
( select $esq.getNumeroSensoresAlertaArea(a.id::text, '1', '${__from:date}', '${__to:date}') ) as "Normal", 
( select $esq.getNumeroSensoresAlertaArea(a.id::text, '2', '${__from:date}', '${__to:date}') ) as "Advertencia",
( select $esq.getNumeroSensoresAlertaArea(a.id::text, '3', '${__from:date}', '${__to:date}') ) as "Alarma" 
from $esq.areas a
  left join $esq.sensores s on s.id_area = a.id
group by a.id
order by a.orden

options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
select * from esq_dash_iot.vmostraralertas
order by fecha desc, id_registro desc
limit 50

select count(*) as "Sensores" from esq_dash_iot.sensores 
where inactivo = false and id in ($sensor)

select count(id) as "Sens. inactivos" from esq_dash_iot.sensores 
where inactivo = true and id in ($sensor)

targets.rawSql: select bateria from $esq.sensores where id in ($sensor)

targets.rawSql:
select a.nombre as nombre_area from esq_dash_iot.sensores s left join esq_dash_iot.areas a on a.id = s.id_area 
where s.id in ($sensor) limit 1

select min, max, advertencia, alarma from esq_dash_iot.limites l 
where l.id_sensor in ($sensor) and l.tipo_medicion in ('temperatura')

select min, max, advertencia, alarma from esq_dash_iot.limites l 
where l.id_sensor in ($sensor) and l.tipo_medicion in ('humedad')
select inactivo as "Estado" from $esq.sensores where id in ($sensor)

list.definition:
WITH sensor_data AS ( 
  select id as __value, nombre_sensor as __text from 
  esq_dash_iot.sensores where  
  case 
    when '$area' = '-1' then true 
    when '$area' = '0' then id_area is null
    else id_area = '$area'::int end
  and case when '$inactividad' = 'todos' then true 
    else inactivo::int::text = '$estado_sensor' end
  and case when '$inactividad' = 'todos' then true 
    else 
  ( select esq_dash_iot.getestadoalertasensor(id::text, '${__from:date}', '${__to:date}') )::text = '$estado_alerta' 
end
  order by id ) select * from sensor_data 
union all SELECT -1 , 'No Hay Sensor' WHERE NOT exists (SELECT 1 FROM sensor_data);
list.label: Sensor
list.name: sensor
list.query:
WITH sensor_data AS ( 
  select id as __value, nombre_sensor as __text from 
  esq_dash_iot.sensores where  
  case 
    when '$area' = '-1' then true 
    when '$area' = '0' then id_area is null
    else id_area = '$area'::int end
  and case when '$inactividad' = 'todos' then true 
    else inactivo::int::text = '$estado_sensor' end
  and case when '$inactividad' = 'todos' then true 
    else 
  ( select esq_dash_iot.getestadoalertasensor(id::text, '${__from:date}', '${__to:date}') )::text = '$estado_alerta' 
end
  order by id ) select * from sensor_data 
union all SELECT -1 , 'No Hay Sensor' WHERE NOT exists (SELECT 1 FROM sensor_data);
